title: Tosafot Rabbi Akiva Eiger on Mishnah Shabbat

titles.text: תוספות רבי עקיבא איגר על משנה שבת
Tosafot Rabbi Akiva Eiger on Mishnah Shabbat

schema.title: Tosafot Rabbi Akiva Eiger on Mishnah Shabbat

enDesc: An analytical commentary almost exclusively discussing the commentaries of Rabbi Ovadia MiBartenura and Rabbi Yom Tov Lipmann Heller (Tosafot Yom Tov) on the Mishnah.
